title: Strengthening E-Learning Practice Competencies: Strategies for Enhancing Accessibility and Inclusivity of Academic Libraries

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library usage experience and comprehension of digital service accessibility concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three barriers that occur in key academic library services (online meetings, information retrieval systems, digital content).
Learners can propose at least five accessibility strategies (e.g., screen-reader functionality, alternative text provision) to improve technology-based library services.
Learners can explain user experience factors to consider when designing inclusive library programs for mobile environments as a three-stage process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
